application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.1 Norway Maple - 2m holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points.T.2 Pear - Pollard by 2m to original pruning points, 10% crown thin, remove all ivy from tree entirely & deadwood.T.3 & T.4  Cypress - Fell.
